title: P5 - looking for R5's Team am willing to play any lane but prefer support/adc
body:
HI im looking to join a Ranked 5's team
for fun but also serious, 
i am hoping to join a team and grow as a team 
and learn how to become a better player on the way 
will play any lane but pref supp/adc

replies.body:
Why don't you pop over here

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/rtbK09th-serious-ranked-5s-team-lf-gold-support-to-join-ranks

and respond to this. Looking for a support
Hey man we currently have 2 open spots on our team both for ADC and Support, add me IG if your interested :) IG: Golden Spatula
Hey I live in Perth If u looking for support I am the man Just add me I usually main {{champion:54}}
Hey man atm i am lvl 26 i am thinking bout having a ranked team and in need of a support if u don't mind waiting for me to get to lvl 30 i would really enjoy having u on the team ;)
